TopicTitle: What did you name your first SPH vehicle?

Articles.Content: My first and so far only one is called Plane the First.
"Airbreaker Y"

Space Plane Mk 1

The next was Space Plane Mk 2

Then Space Plane Mk 3, which actually did make it into space.
Don't really remember but the first one in .22 is the K Flyer.
I still haven't made anything that can go beyond a sub orbital flight. They're just so boring and take forever to get into the upper atmosphere.
Appropriately, the first ship in my 0.15 SPH was called Crashmeister 5000. It lived up to the name.
I named mine Plane Simply as it gets
Well... I don't really name them, they just stay "untitled space craft" because none of them have been sucessful once I get a sucessful design I'll save it and name it.

My first and so far only one is called Plane the First.

Rover S MK1

Mine was called Relativity, I think. Second was Thunderbird, third was uncreatively named "Ion Glider". Usually I suffix iterative revisions with roman numerals until it succeeds or I get bored (whichever comes first).
V -01. As in Vehicle.
"I hope this doesn't fail miserably". It did.

"JebJet"

(tencharminimum)

What I named mine?

The...

"Not going to space"

I simply don't have the patience to wait for it to get past 10KM.

So I launch my planes.

On rockets.
Lrn2Space-1 (oops, this was actually in the VAB, haven't done any planes yet in career mode)
I named my first plane: Horizontal Rocket MK I
Prometheus

Jet-O-Matic.

It was a hilarious death trap.
Kerbin Explorer

The first one that didn't blow up is called "Mun Rover"

It's also the only one I ever build in this carreer mode. I have T9 tech, but I haven't even researched airplane parts yet.

If I don't crash a plane during take off, I'll crash it on contact with the surface. Not even going to call it landing

Fx-M1-Ie

yea, i'm boring like that.

Mine in 0.22 is :

LA4-Raptor

LA means low altitude, 4 means the tech tier, and Raptor is the plane name.

first plane: the debris generator. (it deserved the name. the debris helped me locate the KSC for targeted reentrys.

first successful design: Solar Sailer. (rover using two gigantor solar panels. looked like one of those sail buggies)

Edited October 25, 2013 by toric5

Manned rover.

couldn't get anything into the air until 2 months ago.
